column4: Hello, I'm new to Ubuntu and I'm having some problems with my network. I've looked for solutions on the internet but they tell me to go to "System -> Administration -> Networking". But the "Networking" option isn't there in the "Administration" menu. How do I enable it?
The only option I do have about networking is "Network Tools"
menu options move around between versions.. if you tell us what you're trying to do we might be able to tell you where it is in the version you're using
Sorry, I forgot to mention I'm running Ubuntu 9.04.
